subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer defeated Juan Martín del Potro, 6-1, 6-4, to win the ABN Amro World Tennis in Rotterdam, the Netherlands, for his first title of the year.
snippet: Roger Federer defeated Juan Martín del Potro, 6-1, 6-4, to win the ABN Amro World Tennis in Rotterdam, the Netherlands, for his first title of the year.
